pr_title: Merge analyze and write phases in Painless "user" tree

timeline.message: remove modification of semantic tree for casting
partial change for input and output in expression nodes
updated expression nodes to remove member state
update statements to remove most mutable state

timeline.author: stu-elastic

timeline.bodyText: If this isn't gonna get fixed right away, consider cutting an issue to address this.
timeline.author: stu-elastic

timeline.bodyText: Consider moving this closer to assignment.
timeline.author: stu-elastic

timeline.bodyText: If these aren't going to be the extension point, no need to change visibility.
timeline.author: stu-elastic

replies.bodyText:
If it's all right I would like to leave this for now as extending the nodes is currently the only way to do an extension point in the user tree. As other design ideas are explored, it seems more appropriate to modify them then.
Edit: especially, as a better design is not a guarantee right now
replies.author: jdconrad
